• P ostoperative prophylactic antimicrobial administration is not recommended for most surgeries as this selects

• However, women living with HIV who have the following risk factors may be at higher risk of infection post
caesarean delivery:
o Advanced immunosuppression.
o Prolonged rupture of membranes (>18 hours).
